name: Purikura Daisakusen
description: Purikura Daisakusen (プリクラ大作戦 Purikura Great Tactics) is an arcade game made by Atlus & distributed by Traveller's Tales. Purikura in this case is an abbreviation of "Princess Kurara", of the Power Instinct game series, who stars in this action shooter. It was released in the arcades in 1996 and received a Sega Saturn port later on in the year.
